revised_title: Extraordinary Effect of Lightning on a Bullock: A Case Study
tldr: This article describes a unique case where a bullock was struck by lightning, resulting in the complete removal of its white hair while leaving the red hair unharmed. The authors discuss the possible reasons behind this phenomenon and the effects of lightning on the animal's body. The case study raises questions about the role of hair color in conducting electricity and the impact of lightning on different colored hairs.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Animal Physiology
